Metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2781 affecting package coreutils for versions less than 9.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2016-2781 affecting package coreutils for versions less than 9.4-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package coreutils is earlier than 9.4-1, affected by CVE-2016-2781
